meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Andrea Korte Matt Johnson Cindy Vanderbur Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6362.

td.p: Andrea Korte, an editorial specialist from Washington, D.C.
Matt Johnson, a baker and philosophy instructor from Lancaster, Pennsylvania
Cindy Vanderbur, a health insurance contract specialist from Madison, Indiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,999)

tr.td: THE AFI LIFE ACHIEVEMENT AWARD
JUST DESSERTS
ALL ABOUT ARTISTS
WHO WANTS TO BE A BILLIONAIRE?
SPEAKING HAWAIIAN
ORE
